prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature and depth of my emotional state regarding Stefan's forthcoming communication today?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic list of data drawn strictly from your horary chart for the question “What is the true nature and depth of my emotional state regarding Stefan's forthcoming communication today?” using horary principles. Note that you represent yourself by the Ascendant (1st house, Pisces) and Stefan is indicated by the 9th house (in your cross‐reference, his indicators are drawn from the sign and any planetary factors in that house).

1. Overall Chart Configuration
 • Shape: Bowl form with most planets in the lower left quadrant; top right quadrant is empty.
 • Moon Phase: Waxing crescent moon
 • Mode: Dominance of mutable energy among the inner planets
 • Special note: Inner planets do not appear in Earth signs

2. Key Points and Houses
 • Ascendant: 4°11′ Pisces (represents your personal state; the 1st house contains the primary emotional and self-indicators)
  – Contains: Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron
 • Stefan’s Indicator: 9th house (in your cross-reference—using the chart’s 9th house cusp, starting at 26° Scorpio; no planets are placed here directly, so its condition is understood by the absence of planets and its aspects to neighbouring house rulers if any)
 • Other House Factors:
  – 2nd House (Uranus in Aries)
  – 3rd House (Jupiter in Gemini)
  – 4th House (empty, begins at 16° Gemini)
  – 5th House (Mars in Cancer, retrograde)
  – 6th House (begins at 25° Cancer)
  – 7th House (begins at 4° Virgo)
  – 8th House (begins at 24° Libra)
  – 10th House (MC in 16° Sagittarius)
  – 11th House (begins at 3° Capricorn)
  – 12th House (begins at 25° Capricorn, containing Sun, Mercury, and Pluto)

3. Planetary Positions
 • Sun: 14°58′ Aquarius
 • Moon (emotional indicator): 21°45′ Aries
 • Mercury: 10°41′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 29°25′ Pisces
 • Mars: 19°44′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°16′ Gemini (retrograde)
 • Saturn: 17°42′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°02′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°08′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°43′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19°34′ Aries

4. Major Aspects (with orbs noted in horary practice)
 • Mars square Chiron (orb ~0°)
 • Moon square Mars (orb ~2°)
 • Moon conjunction Chiron (orb ~2°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb ~1°)
 • Sun sextile MC (orb ~2°)
 • Sun trine IC (orb ~2°)
 • Chiron sextile IC (orb ~3°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb ~0°)
 • Saturn square IC (orb ~1°) and square MC (orb ~1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb ~1°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb ~1°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb ~3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb ~3°)
 • Chiron trine MC (orb ~3°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb ~3°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb ~4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb ~4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb ~5°)
 • Moon sextile IC (orb ~5°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb ~5°)
 • Jupiter opposition MC and conjunction IC (orb ~5°)
 • Moon trine MC (orb ~5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb ~6°)
 • Venus sextile Uranus (orb ~6°)
 • Mercury sextile MC (orb ~6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb ~6°)
 • Mercury trine IC (orb ~6°)
 • Jupiter square Ascendant (orb ~7°)
 • Mercury conjunct Pluto (orb ~8°)

5. Patterns Identified
 • T-Square:
  – Involving the MC (16° Sagittarius), Saturn (17° Pisces), IC (16° Gemini), and Jupiter (11° Gemini)
 • Cradle:
  – Formed by the MC (16° Sagittarius), IC (16° Gemini), Chiron (19° Aries), and Sun (14° Aquarius)

6. Timing and Additional Indicators
 • The sextile aspect is frequent (11 occurrences), suggesting an underlying potential for opportunities amid tension.
 • The presence of the Moon in Aries (a fire sign) contributes to an assertive, direct emotional tone, though its square to Mars suggests conflicting impulses or stress.

This list constitutes all the core chart data drawn from your horary chart according to traditional horary principles. Please confirm once you have documented these particulars for further interpretation.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
In examining your horary chart for the question concerning your emotional state regarding Stefan’s forthcoming communication today, several key factors emerge.

1. Your Ascendant in Pisces, with its host of sensitive factors including Venus, Neptune, Saturn, the North Node, and Chiron, emphasizes a deep reservoir of emotional intuition and vulnerability. The presence of Venus and Neptune here signals an idealistic yearning and a tendency toward retaining emotional impressions that blend reality with longing. The North Node and Chiron also indicate that your inner emotional wounds, as well as lessons of growth and self-acceptance, are active in how you process connection.

2. The Moon, placed in Aries, provides a stark, assertive pulse to your feelings. Its square to Mars reinforces an element of impulsiveness and volatility—your internal drive is both vigorous and sometimes conflicted. The Moon’s conjunction with Chiron suggests that beneath the assertive surface, old wounds are being triggered by the anticipation of Stefan’s message, leaving you exposed to pain if misread or mishandled.

3. A noticeable tension is present through aspects like Mars square Chiron and Moon square Mars. These highlight a potential conflict between your instinctual response and the need for healing. The irritation stemming from inner vulnerabilities may cause you to react defensively, even if your conscious intent is to remain open to what Stefan might communicate.

4. The numerous sextile aspects, with their facilitative energy, indicate that opportunities exist to ease the tension. Mercury trine Jupiter, Sun trine Jupiter, and Mercury sextile MC together point to an underlying optimism and support from your intellect and social connections. These aspects suggest that, despite the initial turbulences, there is capacity for constructive resolution and a broader perspective that could soothe the emotional intensity.

5. The T-square circuit involving your MC (16° Sagittarius), Saturn (17° Pisces), and IC (16° Gemini) complemented by Jupiter in Gemini stresses a conflict between public expectation and private, internal experience. With Saturn square both your IC and MC, there is an aura of seriousness and perhaps some anxiety surrounding both your personal foundations and public persona. This configuration can imply that any communication from Stefan will stir not only surface feelings but also deep-seated concerns rooted in your heritage of self-worth and emotional stability.

6. The “Cradle” pattern (MC, IC, Chiron, and Sun) weaves another layer into the reading. It suggests that the current emotional dynamic is part of a larger life cycle that involves nurturing hidden parts of yourself. The Sun in Aquarius—an indicator of rationality and forward-thinking—works to bridge potential disillusionment with clarity. It implies that while the emotional state is raw and susceptible, there is also the capacity for transformative insight should the conversation lead to genuine understanding.

7. Regarding Stefan’s marker represented by the 9th house (as per your cross-reference), its condition is indirectly confirmed by the peripheral nature of his indicators: a lack of planetary occupation in the 9th house can denote that his forthcoming communication may be brief, understated, or lacking in the depth you might expect. This absence contributes to a sense of uncertainty or incomplete communication, echoing in your feelings of vulnerability as you await clarity.

Overall, the chart depicts your emotional state as one of intense, conflicted sensitivity. There is a raw and unguarded aspect to your feelings, primed by both idealism and unresolved wounds. Where the Moon’s assertiveness and its challenging aspects signal an atmosphere of tension, the beneficial sextiles and supportive trines imbue an underlying message of potential healing and clarity. Stefan’s indicated communication, emerging as a somewhat external or foreign influence, carries the risk of stirring up these dynamics without providing the complete emotional fulfillment you seek.

Interpretation based solely on the horary data shows that your anticipation is fraught with internal conflict, tempered by a readiness to grow. While the expectations for meaningful exchange are high, the energy surrounding Stefan may fall short of your emotional needs. This suggests a moment for reflection: even as you yearn for clear communication, your internal blueprint warns that any message may trigger long-standing sensitivities and require conscious engagement with your ongoing healing process.
